title: LeBron James, Lakers, Eli Manning, James Harden, and the Warriors
itunes:title: LeBron James, Lakers, Eli Manning, James Harden, and the Warriors
description:
Colin discusses the Los Angeles Lakers dysfunction, star players not wanting to play with F LeBron James, why the New York Giants should get rid of QB Eli Manning, why he was happy to see Houston Rockets G James Harden's streak come to an end, and how teams can beat the Golden State Warriors. Guests include Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, Matt Barnes, and Marcedes Lewis. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
